participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Ethan loves exploring the great outdoors and pushing his physical limits.
participant_1.background: i live in colorado. i am a mechanical engineer. i like to go hiking in the spring. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i have a black lab named trooper.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and determined, Sophia is focused on her career goals and values hard work and perseverance.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.
